● 30 November, 2016
Melbourne Meat Market
5 Blackwood Street, North Melbourne

The conference

CSSConf is a community conference dedicated to the designers and developers who build the world’s most engaging user interfaces. For the community, from the community.

Tickets

Regular Bird: $450 Regular Bird (CSSConf, JSConf, Decompress): $900

Get your ticket now

News

 Jul 01 A better Call For Proposals  Jul 01 Programming Inclusion  Feb 18 The unexpected future of CSSConf AU

Mailing list

For more announcements follow @cssconfau or sign up to our mailing list below.

Code of Conduct

All organisers, sponsors and attendees are required to follow the conference Code of Conduct. We are committed to providing a harassment-free, professional and welcoming environment for all attendees.

Sponsors

We’re looking for more people to help support the event. If your organisation could help, please drop an email to sponsors@cssconf.com.au for more details.
